successes.title: GoldieBlox: The Engineering Toy for Girls
successes.description: GoldieBlox is a construction toy + book series starring Goldie, the kid inventor who loves to build.

Pledges.description: ***FRIDGE MAGNET + STICKER*** We GoldieBlox girls like showcasing our accomplishments on the fridge. You will get a GoldieBlox refrigerator magnet to show off your girls' brilliant masterpieces. Plus, a sticker because we're all stuck on Goldie.

***T-SHIRT*** Walk the walk with the GoldieBlox limited edition t-shirt that reads, "More Than Just a Princess," available in kid and adult sizes! (Free Shipping to US and Canada. For international orders, please add $10 for shipping).

**************GET THE TOY************** This is it. The complete GoldieBlox toy: her first storybook, "GoldieBlox and the Spinning Machine," construction set and character figurines shipped right to your door. (Free Shipping to US and Canada. For international orders, please add $20 for shipping).

***GOLDIE'S POWER PACK***
Toy + T-Shirt + Star-Shaped Sunglasses, so your girl can roll up to her play-date in style. (Free Shipping to US and Canada. Sorry, no international orders for this level).

***HACKER HOODIE*** Who's the next female Mark Zuckerberg? YOU in this limited-edition GoldieBlox adult hoodie. Plus, we'll throw in a sticker and fridge magnet. (Free Shipping to US and Canada. For international orders, please add $20 for shipping).
***GET TWO TOYS*** No more sibling rivalry! You get two GoldieBlox toys shipped right to your door. (Free Shipping in US and Canada. Sorry, no international orders for this level yet.)

**INTERNATIONAL: GOLDIE'S POWER PACK*** 
For international orders of "Goldie's Power Pack" detailed above shipped to areas beyond U.S. and Canada.
***GET THREE TOYS*** You get three GoldieBlox toys shipped right to your door. (Free Shipping in US and Canada. Sorry, no international orders for this level yet.)
**GET THE WHOLE GANG** This is the big one! Get Book 1 (Feb 2013), Book 2 (Apr 2013) and Book 3 (May 2013) delivered right to your door. US & Canada only.

***INTERNATIONAL: GET TWO TOYS***
For international orders of "Get Two Toys" detailed above shipped to areas beyond U.S. and Canada.
***GET FOUR TOYS*** You get four GoldieBlox toys shipped right to your door. (Free Shipping in US and Canada. Sorry, no international orders for this level yet.)

***MOMMY & ME*** Get the TOY plus a hoodie for mom, a t-shirt for daughter and two pairs of sunnies. After all, moms make the best role models. (Free Shipping to US and Canada. Sorry, no international orders for this level).

***INTERNATIONAL GET THREE TOYS*** 
For international orders of "Get Three Toys" detailed above shipped to areas beyond U.S. and Canada.
**INTERNATIONAL GET THE WHOLE GANG** This is the big one! Get Book 1 (Feb 2013), Book 2 (Apr 2013) and Book 3 (May 2013) delivered right to your door anywhere in the world!

***INTERNATIONAL MOMMY & ME***
For international orders of "Mommy & Me" detailed above shipped to areas beyond U.S. and Canada.

***INTERNATIONAL GET FOUR TOYS*** 
For international orders of "Get Four Toys" detailed above shipped to areas beyond U.S. and Canada.

***BFF PACKAGE*** Get 4 GoldieBlox toys, plus 4 kids' t-shirts, 4 stickers and 4 pairs of sunnies to quadruple the fun. (Free Shipping to US and Canada. Sorry, no international orders for this level).

****PARTY IN A BOX**** Everything you need to throw the ultimate GoldieBlox party. Get TEN GoldieBlox toys plus 10 stickers and 10 pairs of sunnies. You can hoard them for yourself (and please send us pics of what you build) OR share 'em with the neighborhood. (Free Shipping to US and Canada. Sorry, no international orders for this level).

****COLLECTOR'S PRINT****Get a limited-edition print of an original GoldieBlox illustration (choose from 1 of 3 pictures) signed by Debbie and shipped in time for the holidays. This is a collector's item, only offered in this Kickstarter campaign. Put GoldieBlox on your wall of fame. PLUS, you'll get a GoldieBlox toy come February AND be recognized as a rock star supporter on our website.

***PERSONALIZED SKETCH***An illustration of Goldie with your child(ren) or pet (or YOU!) drawn and signed by Debbie. Little known fact: Debbie inherited her artistic skills from her grandmother, one of the first female cartoonists at Disney and the creator of "Mr. Magoo". PLUS, you will be recognized as a mega rock star supporter on our website.

***UP CLOSE AND PERSONAL*** Debbie will come speak at your next big event, whether it's a school function, brownie troop retreat or corporate soiree. Appearances will come complete with 20 toys for you to keep, plus you'll get to hear Debbie's story first-hand and ask her what it's like to be a female engineer. PLUS, we will record the experience and share it with all our friends.
